column1: #Text=Opal says : " Did you find any way to escape ? "
#Text=" Ikki says : " Korra will come and save us , right ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I think we 're gon na have to do this on our own .
#Text=As soon as she 's in the Avatar State , take her out .
#Text=Why is n't she staying in the Avatar State ?
